law.text: The authority conferred upon the commissioner, or the person the commissioner delegates, to extend the limits of confinement of a prisoner or to grant furloughs by KRS 439.580 to 439.630, extends to all persons committed to any correctional institution or facility.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 105, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 344, sec. 57, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 293, sec. 6.
